description: The mountains before you almost seem to be harvesting the intense heat
from the Desert of the Elemental Canyon.  The sands here radiate heat, and
have a coarse, almost rough texture.  The entire canyon seems to shimmer
with an almost magical glow.
22043.name: The Arc of the Diamond Sea

description: The blistering heat and dead winds create a illusionary haze muddling
everthing around you.  Walking along the shores of the Sands of Sorrow, the
coarse, golden sands of the desert merge with the gray sands of the shore,
creating an interesting mosaiic.
22029.name: The Shores of the Sands of Sorrow

description: The blistering heat and dead winds create a illusionary haze muddling

description: A cool breeze blows as you travel along the coast.  The air here is humid
and cold.  Endless ocean seems to stretch it's reach beyond eyesight.  The
north holds a large mountain range, and the south stretches as far as the
eye can see.
22010.name: Nothern Shorelines

description: Again here, many people can be seen lounging and relaxing as they take
in a meal of many during days.  Tables and trays are a common sight here
with good quality meals served on them.  Though the choice is sometimes
limited, the food is usually quite good.

22031.name: The Arc of the Diamond Sea

description: {*  Dark and vast, the Circuli is a room with unbelievable expanse
{*with its dimensions noted only by the three 'rings' of seats
{*which hang elevated above the room, serving as proof that a
{*third dimension indeed exists in this place.  The floor is a
{*patterned peice of art, with shiny obsidian tiles with white-
{*marble lines that form a design of sorts, which only a part
{*is seen, due to the lighting of the room:  One single powerful
{*spotlight which vectors light from overhead.{X

description: Though the deck itself is mostly sealed with blast doors, the residency
deck still keeps a quaint atmosphere to it as workers walk to and about
the various rooms and halls.  Each hall is a tetrad formation, like a
sort of pyramidical structure.  The halls are illuminated by poly-light
globes located intermittently throughout the area.

description: A few common officers and operatives are among the occupants of
the Lounge, socializing and relaxing between shifts of duty and
research.  People work hard to keep things as functional as
reasonably possible, and upholding the Nytek lifestyle as best
as they can.

description: A series of couches and pools line to heal those that would require it,
or even simply to rest.  The bunks are specially enhanced to help heal
the physical wounds of the body, wheras the pools are made for enhanced
mana restoration.

22002.name: (no short description)~

F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
This tiny goblin-like creature sits here by his fire in-between his
trips to raid the countryside.  Perhaps he is merely poor, or maybe he
is one of the robbers of the worst type that seem to be plaguing the
lands.
22051.room_name: This pitiful specimen of the goblin race sits here, busily working away at nothing.
22051.name: a ugly little creature~

description:
This lizard sticks out its forked tongue, feeling out the shape of
the world around it.  Living in this darkness for all of its life, it
seems to be quite blind.
22052.room_name: A tiny lizard skitters across the cave floor, hoping to remain unseen.
22052.name: a tiny lizard~
